name: KAPTAIN-KRONCH
description:
a game by ofek mor , bar nemesh, gal shaffir and the amazing tig redeye.

play against a friend and make e'm walk da plank! 
dont get hit by your own shots!!

controls:
player 1 - arrow keys for movment, right shift to shoot.
player 2- wasd keys for movment, left shift to shoot.

aim where you look! 3 hits and your out~ dont get blown to bits!
